net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.shutdown
Class WildcardFileFilter

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.shutdown.WildcardFileFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileFilter
public class WildcardFileFilter
extends Object
implements FileFilter

Wildcard file filter that operates relative to a root directory.

The following wildcards are allowed in the file pattern:

  • ? matches a single file name character.
  • * matches any number of file name characters.
  • ** matches any number of file name and directory separator characters.

The following example will yield a list of all .txt files (including those found in subdirectories) found starting at the directory /home/somewhere/texts:

WildcardfileFilter.list(new File("/home/somewhere/texts"), "**&#x2F;*.txt");

Version:
1.6 (2008/03/30 12:43:22)

Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>

protected boolean createMatchDirectories(Pattern pattern)
Check if directories should be matched by this pattern or not.

Note:

If you override this method, also override createPattern(String).

Parameters:

Returns:
true if directories should be matched, false otherwise.

accept

public boolean accept(File file)
Accepts files matching the file pattern specified at construction time.

Files to be matched have to be relative to the root directory also specified at construction time.
